description:
Leverage the power of GeoLearning’s award-winning Software as a Service (SaaS) Learning Management System (LMS) from your mobile device. The GeoMaestro™ mobile application is an app that allows for the secure download and access of mobile-friendly learning content to any webOS device.

Upon installing the app you will be asked to provide your GeoMaestro username & password. Note: you must have an account for GeoMaestro and your account must be mobile-enabled. Please contact your site administrator if you have any questions regarding login or accessibility.

Once logged in users can select from a variety of learning modules and activities (including videos and simulations) to download locally to the device - all controlled from a security standpoint based on their learning management system permissions. Content can include tests and knowledge checks with the scores from these exams, as well as overall status of the content, feeding back to the GeoMaestro LMS for reporting purposes.

The mobile learning solution delivered by GeoMaestro is ideal for organizations looking to educate a mobile and remote workforce with up-to-date product information, sales updates, certification or compliance training, performance support materials, and other types of knowledge and communications. Expand the reach of information to both your internal organization as well as extended enterprise by leveraging GeoMaestro’s mobility solution and make it more convenient for your employees and partners to gain the knowledge they need, when they need it.

For sales inquiries or for more information about the GeoMaestro LMS and our mobile learning solution, please visit http://www.geolearning.com/mobility or contact us via phone at 800-970-9903 or email at info@geolearning.com. We are a well recognized learning services company with an award-winning LMS product that helps companies outsmart, outmaneuver and outperform their competition through knowledge elevation and business execution.
